column1: faye moorer harp -- mullins funeral home & crematory| memorial donations. memorial donations may be made to:fairlawn baptist church
column13: alabama. faye was a faithful member of fairlawn baptist church for 57 years. she retired from leggett and was always known for her classic elegance and grace. she was preceded in death by her husband
column22: jack and ross. survivors include son and daughter-in-law

column31: 2015 at the fairlawn baptist church with dr. jim baucom officiating. the family will receive friends from 5 until 7 p. m. prior to the service. graveside services will be held at 10 a. m.

column37: va 24141. the harp family is in the care of mullins funeral home & crematory in radford. www. mullinsfuneralhome. com
